Title: docker volume and volumes_from
Description:
docker ps -a

create data container

docker create -v /data --name data busybox
docker ps -a

run with data container

docker run --rm --volumes-from data -it busybox /bin/sh
ls -al /data
touch /data/FIRST
ls -al /data
exit

run another with data container

docker run --rm --volumes-from data -it busybox /bin/sh
ls -al /data
exit
